text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2080. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The port selection is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS ROG G703GX Desktop Replacement Gaming Laptop, GeForce RTX 2080, 17.3” FHD 144Hz G-SYNC, Intel Core i9-8950HK CPU, 32GB DDR4, 1.5TB PCIe SSD (RAID 0), Per-Key RGB, Windows 10 Pro - G703GX-XS98K!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2080. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The port selection is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS ROG G703GX Desktop Replacement Gaming Laptop, GeForce RTX 2080, 17.3” FHD 144Hz G-SYNC, Intel Core i9-8950HK CPU, 32GB DDR4, 1.5TB PCIe SSD (RAID 0), Per-Key RGB, Windows 10 Pro - G703GX-XS98K!

An average performer. The NVIDIA RTX 2080 is good, but I expected a bit more from the trackpad on the ASUS ROG G703GX Desktop Replacement Gaming Laptop, GeForce RTX 2080, 17.3” FHD 144Hz G-SYNC, Intel Core i9-8950HK CPU, 32GB DDR4, 1.5TB PCIe SSD (RAID 0), Per-Key RGB, Windows 10 Pro - G703GX-XS98K. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2080. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The port selection is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS ROG G703GX Desktop Replacement Gaming Laptop, GeForce RTX 2080, 17.3” FHD 144Hz G-SYNC, Intel Core i9-8950HK CPU, 32GB DDR4, 1.5TB PCIe SSD (RAID 0), Per-Key RGB, Windows 10 Pro - G703GX-XS98K!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2080 in the ASUS ROG G703GX Desktop Replacement Gaming Laptop, GeForce RTX 2080, 17.3” FHD 144Hz G-SYNC, Intel Core i9-8950HK CPU, 32GB DDR4, 1.5TB PCIe SSD (RAID 0), Per-Key RGB, Windows 10 Pro - G703GX-XS98K is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.
